page.title: 05SHALFORD COMMON
page.content: Shalford Common is situated to the south of Shalford village.It contains several leisure facilities, including a cricket wicket and football pitch. Shalford pond is used for fishing and is famous for the frog and toad crossing in the Spring.Shalford Common is lined by terraced,semi-detached and detached houses. Next to the common lies the busy Shalford/Horsham road and a mini-roundabout where many accidents have occurred.This is the reason why they are enlarging it at the presant time.
